mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id AS userId, a.username AS userName, CASE ui.attribute WHEN 0 THEN d1. NAME WHEN 1 THEN d1. NAME WHEN 2 THEN dd1. NAME WHEN 3 THEN dd1. NAME END AS regionName, CASE ui.attribute WHEN 0 THEN d2. NAME WHEN 1 THEN d2. NAME WHEN 2 THEN dd2. NAME WHEN 3 THEN dd2. NAME END AS branchName, CASE ui.attribute WHEN 0 THEN d3. NAME WHEN 1 THEN d3. NAME WHEN 2 THEN dd3. NAME WHEN 3 THEN dd3. NAME END AS departmentName FROM ht_user a LEFT JOIN ht_user_info ui ON a.user_id = ui.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_spreads_user su ON a.user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_user uu ON uu.user_id = su.spreads_user_id LEFT JOIN ht_user_info uui ON uui.user_id = su.spreads_user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_users ou ON ou.hyd_id = su.spreads_user_id AND ou.user_status IN ('E', 'Q1', 'Q11', 'Q2', 'Q21') LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department d3 ON ou.departmentid = d3.id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department d2 ON d3.parentid = d2.id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department d1 ON d2.parentid = d1.id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_users ouu ON ouu.hyd_id = a.user_id AND ouu.user_status IN ('E', 'Q1', 'Q11', 'Q2', 'Q21') LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department dd3 ON ouu.departmentid = dd3.id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department dd2 ON dd3.parentid = dd2.id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department dd1 ON dd2.parentid = dd1.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}
